1.content: Analyze and Extract Key Information from Source Documents
1.details: 1. Read and analyze README_ultimate.md comprehensively. 2. Read and analyze Project_Architecture_Document.md. 3. Extract technical components, architecture patterns, operational procedures. 4. Identify AI agent-specific requirements and actionable information.

2.content: Synthesize Technical Information for AI Agent Context
2.details: 1. Reorganize extracted information for AI agent optimization. 2. Focus on technical components, data flows, key files, commands. 3. Structure from high-level overview to specific implementation details. 4. Identify critical files for modification and API interaction points.

3.details: 1. Structure document with AI agent-optimized organization. 2. Include project overview, tech stack, architecture deep-dive. 3. Provide actionable setup, development, and deployment commands. 4. Document key files, API endpoints, and operational procedures. 5. Include troubleshooting and maintenance guidelines.

4.details: 1. Review synthesized document for completeness and accuracy. 2. Ensure technical accuracy and actionable information. 3. Validate that AI agent can effectively use this as operational guide. 4. Optimize structure and clarity for AI comprehension.
